metadata.title: CVE-2018-12982 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Invalid memory read in the PoDoFo::PdfVariant::DelayedLoad() function inPdfVariant.h in PoDoFo 0.9.6-rc1 allows remote attackers to havedenial-of-service impact via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
